byline.contributor: Christine Hauser contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Seattle authorities are investigating collision between North Seattle College bus and amphibious vehicle that killed four international college students enrolled at North Seattle College and injured nearly 50 other people; many victims speak little or no English and had arrived in country just before accident.
lead_paragraph: More than two dozen people were being treated in Seattle hospitals, many of them in intensive care, a day after a bus packed with international students and a tour bus collided.

headline.main: College Students Killed in Seattle Bus Crash Were New to the Campus and the Country
headline.print_headline: College Students Killed in Seattle Were New to the Campus and the Country

snippet: More than two dozen people were being treated in Seattle hospitals, many of them in intensive care, a day after a bus packed with international students and a tour bus collided.
